text: The Diocese of Monteverde (Latin: Dioecesis Montis Viridis) was a Roman Catholic diocese located in the town of Monteverde in the province of Avellino in Southern Italy. In 1718, it was suppressed to the Diocese of Sant'Angelo dei Lombardi e Bisaccia."Diocese of Monteverde" Catholic-Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved August 25, 2016"Titular Episcopal See of Monteverde" GCatholic.org. Gabriel Chow. Retrieved August 25, 2016 ==Ordinaries== *Gerolamo de Caro (13 Mar 1521 – 3 Jul 1531 Appointed, Titular Bishop of Cannae)"Archbishop Gerolamo de Caro" Catholic-Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. title: Roman Catholic Diocese of Monteverde
